page.title: 16HOUSING
page.content: The housing in the area we covered was in Upper Framilode,Lower Framilode and Rodley.In Rodley there is a mixture of {Farms} and{Cottages}all of which are owner occupied.All of the houses are on either side of the road in Linear development.There are no{shops}or {public houses}but there is a small {Village Hall}and{Church. On the opposite side of the river are the small communities of Framilode and Upper Framilode.There are again no{ {shops} but there are two{Public Houses called the{Dorell Arms}and the{Ship {Inn.}There is a{Church}called{St. {Peter's}.There were more {terraced {cottages}built alongside the disused canal but the houses on the whole were more modern.Some had been built quite recently. { }
